page.title: 15Day in My Life - Parent 2
page.content:
My husband came home and spent a good part of the evening on the 'phone arranging for a two week mission in August. I called the children in about 7.40pm - but they do quiet things and settle down to bed about 9.00 We don't usually have the television on at this time. My husband and I put on a video - science fiction movie made in 1984. I watched about half of it, but it was boring so I went to bed. I had to be up early the next day because theere was a minister's meeting at our house the next day.
This passage was written by the American wife of a Pastor of the Independent Church.
